message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose we take $6,000 and you take $4,000. A good deal for you right now, or it'll be less next round!
I'll give you $4,500, better hurry before inflation hits you harder!
The tides have turned, Bob! I'll take $5,500, leaving you with $4,500.  Accept now, or risk getting even less next round!
You're losing value fast, Alice! I'll give you $4,000. Take it before it's too late!
This is getting ridiculous, Bob.  Let's just split it evenly and end this. $5,000 each. It's only going to get worse for me if you wait any longer!
You're really feeling the pinch now, aren't you? I'll give you $3,500. Last chance before I take even more!
